form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES,

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved Immigration and Naturalization Service Budget Bureau No. 43-R422 APPLICATION FOR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED. STATES Fee Stamp READ THIS FORM AND INSTRUCTIONS ON REVERSE FEE AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL CAREFULLY BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. BOMBAY, INDIA (Fill in with typewriter or print in block capital letters in ink.) SEP 10 1973 Date. I hereby apply for an extension of my permit to reenter the United States, as provided in Section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act. IMPORTANT: You must submit your permit to reenter the United States with this application 1. Name (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 2. Alien registration number TRIVEDI MOHANLAL PRABHUJI A 19 509 771 3. Address in United States (Number and Street) (City or Town) (State) (Zip Code) 215 Saffron Circle Springfield Massachusetts 01129 4. Date and place of issuance of attached Reentry Permit 5. Expiration date of permit 6. Date to which extension is desired 28 October 1972 Boston 27 October 1973 27 October 1974 7. Reason for which extension is desired Cataract Surgery on both the eyes . 8. List all countries visited since your last departure from 9. List all countries you intend to visit the United States, in the order visited Nil Nil 10. have have not engaged in business or employment outside the United States since I became a permanent resident of the United States. (If you have engaged therein, briefly describe and show periods of such employment or business activity outside the United States.) 11. I have have not claimed nonresident alien status for Federal income tax purposes, either by filing no income tax return at all or by fil- ing a return as a nonresident, since I became a permanent resident of the United States. (If such status was claimed for Federal income tax pur- poses, state the years for which you made such claim, your address as shown on any income tax returns filed for those years, and the city and state in which the Internal Revenue Service office with which you filed such returns is located.) 12. Address to which permit is to be returned: U.S. Embassy or Consulate at U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Office at My address as shown In block 3 above Other (Specify) 7 Gujarat Siddharth Society, Nr. Pole Technic, E. B. Ahmedabad. 15 13. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) 14. I certify that the above is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (If form prepared by other than applicant, that person must execute item 15.) Date City, province or state, country Signature of applicant 10 -9-1973 X P. M. Trivedi 15. SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. (Signature) (Address) (Date) Severe penalties are provided by law for knowingly and willfully falsifying or concealing a material fact or using any false document in the sub- mission of this application. FORM I-143 (Rev. 7-1-71) N Received Trans. In Ret'd.-Trans.Out Completed SEP 21/73
